column1: Narrator : The island is quite huge. CAPITAINE softly hears music from behinds the dunes.

column1: Narrator : CAPITAINE steps into an old barn, crowded with sailors. They’re all playing enraged games of cards.
column4: Narrator : CAPITAINE opens the doors of a stinky bar. A few players bet their last coins. Behind the counter, a waiter is cleaning a bunch of pints.
column8: Narrator : In a dark and narrow room, CAPITAINE stands in front of a few worried men, sitted around a table.
column11: Narrator : CAPITAINE steps into a bar, crowded with sailors, playing cards and such
